body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hotel Express customer support. My name is Nathan Henderson. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Frank. Can you please provide me with the first three digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Now, could you share with me the last two digits of your zip code?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Frank. Now, please let me know how I can assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m calling because I received rotten food..

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Frank. I will ensure that our team addresses the issue regarding I received rotten food. as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day.

vendor_schema.prompt: Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
